data.comment: It seems as if Noa Lang is unable to continue. David Okereke replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 38, The home team has substituted Steven Defour with Onur Kaya. Wouter Vrancken is thus making his first change.
Thibault Peyre (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Jonathan Lardot blows to end the first-half.
Nikola Storm (Mechelen) has received a first yellow card.
Jonathan Lardot has blown to start the second-half.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Simon Deli replacing Eder Balanta.
In the minute 63, Rocky Bushiri is booked for the home team.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Krepin Diatta.
Mechelen make their second substitution with Sheldon Bateau replacing Rocky Bushiri.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Nikola Storm with Gustav Engvall. This is the third substitution made today by Wouter Vrancken.
Goal! Brugge extend their lead to 0-2 through Krepin Diatta.
Hans Vanaken instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Krepin Diatta with Ignace Van Der Brempt.
Goal! David Okereke extends Brugge's lead to 0-3.
Mats Rits with an assist there.
The match is over. Final score 0-3.
